1.0.name: wordpress/simple-qrcode
1.0.description:
With This Plugin you Easily insert QR codes in your blog, with Widget or Shortcode. the plugin add a tinymce button so even the shortcode can be inserted for you.

Main features:

  • Very easy to use.
  • TinyMCE button for easy shortcode insertion.
  • built-in Widget.
  • Use as shortcode.
  • Use as template tag for easy integration with your theme or plugin.

any Feedback is Welcome.
